meanings.definition: A method or way of doing something.
meanings.sent1: Her modus of studying involves making colorful mind maps.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the best modus for completing the project on time.
meanings.sent3: His modus of eating pizza with a fork and knife always makes us laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cooking, her modus of adding a pinch of love to every dish sets her apart.
meanings.sent5: The detective's modus of solving mysteries by observing small details was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: A particular form or style of something.
meanings.sent1: The artist's modus of painting with bold colors caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Each culture has its own unique modus of celebrating special occasions.
meanings.sent3: His modus of wearing mismatched socks became his signature look.
meanings.sent4: The garden's modus of blooming in vibrant hues was like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The writer's modus of storytelling through vivid imagery captivated readers.
